revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Token | name = You've blown up the computer | class = QuestItem27 | game = Strife | convid = 338 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:Inventory|Inventory]]→[[Classes:QuestItem|QuestItem]]→QuestItem27
''Quest Flag 27 - Destroyed the [[Classes:Computer|computer]] in the [[Classes:StrifeBishop|Bishop's]] fortress. Checked to determine which "good" ending the player will receive, even though this bit flag will be set regardless of the path taken. It is believed the purpose of the computer may have changed during late development, causing this bit flag to become effectively useless. See also [[Classes:QuestItem25|Flag 25]].'' ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR QuestItem27 : {{Class|QuestItem}} {}
